name: DHL
natural_language_description: 这是 DHL 节点。主要用于: Consume DHL API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: shipment

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

trackingNumber.name: trackingNumber
trackingNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tracking Number | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: recipientPostalCode (值: None) - DHL will return more detailed information on the shipment when you provide the Recipient's Postal Code - it acts as a verification step
